#Text=Q :
#Text=Which Council decision since the 2003 election do you feel the city/ward should be most proud of and least proud .
#Text=A :
#Text=There are many decisions that I am proud we made both locally and city-wide .

#Text=For the ward , the development and selection of a citizen team to choose the direction for the future method of disposal of residual waste will be selected ; as well as providing recommendations on a potential site is the most important decision made this term .

#Text=Secondly , the success in receiving significant funding from the city to build the newest and biggest skateboard park in the city together with a private sponsor is a great success for the youth of the ward and city .

#Text=The political composition of the Council wherein the majority of the suburban councillors struggle , to support initiatives which reflect the needs of the inner city was a major drawback of this past Council .

#Text=The art of compromise to receive Council approval on a series of initiatives like the City budget for example , led to the reduction in the effectiveness of the Toronto Transit Ridership growth strategy .
#Text=Recommended spending for the Beautiful City campaign was cut as a result of a " them-and-us " voting attitude .

#Text=However , changes to the Council procedural rules for the next term will allow for greater decision-making , in some cases at the local community council level , and by an Executive Committee of Council in order for the Mayor to enact bylaws that reflect the Mayor 's Vision for the City .
#Text=Q :
#Text=What does Toronto mean to you ?
#Text=A :
#Text=Toronto is where I live , where I grew up , and where I have raised my family .
#Text=It 's my home .
#Text=I am inspired by the opportunities that present themselves here in our City .
#Text=This is a thriving , growing and developing young City .
#Text=Recently , growth in the downtown areas has been very strong .
#Text=Locally , our communities are stable but in some cases challenged by change .
#Text=Making change work positively for the city and local neighbourhoods is an exciting everyday activity for me as a City Councillor .
#Text=William Gallos
#Text=William Gallos candidate city council for Ward 32 , Beaches — East York .
#Text=Q :
#Text=Describe the three most important issues in your campaign .
#Text=A :
#Text=Ward 32 is a unique family community within a major city .

#Text=In order to preserve our quality of life , we must be ever vigilant to ensure we are n't overrun by city by-laws , poor transportation and parking issues , unsafe environmental issues due to sewage treatment plant drugs/crime and unsafe streets and park management .

#Text=My aim is to have the community work with me to help economic gross with in the bussinesses , provide safe streets , clean up and maintanence of your parks and boardwalk , establish Sewage Treatment Plan , and much more ...
